de.grau.organizer.database.interfaces

Interface EventsManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventsManagerRealm

    public interface EventsManager
    Interface for an EventsManager Used to abstract the actual EventsManager instance from a specific database All database Handlers need to implement this interface
